section.p: Represents information about the educational experience of an Individual Healthcare Provider. This includes both formal training resulting in some sort of degree or certification, as well as practical experience such as an internship.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] educationalInstitution, where its type is Educational Institution
An organization created to provide educational instruction. Specifically, a school or institution of higher learning.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
Contains the dates (start and end) during which the provider's education took place.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
Contains the dates (start and end) during which the provider's education took place.

Contains exactly one [1..1] educationalInstitution, where its type is Educational Institution
An organization created to provide educational instruction. Specifically, a school or institution of higher learning.
